overview: Power fucker Jaxton Wheeler likes to call the shots. In this first part of the Abandoned series, Cody Smith obediently fulfills all of Jaxton's wishes. Handcuffed to a bedside table until further notice, Jaxton eventually returns to ravage Cody's ass until he shoots his hot load all over him, only to leave him once again, shackled and begging for more.
title: Abandoned
